name: search_guardian_news_content
description: Search news content from The Guardian using the Guardian API based on a search query and additional filters.

page.description: The page number for paginated results. Default is 1.

from_date.description: The date filter for the content, format: 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Optional.

tag.description: A specific tag to filter the results (e.g., 'politics/politics'). Optional.
